title: OSC Compass Admin
description:
The Compass frontend web admin app used for handling users, viewing stats and resolving issues.
Integrates with the Compass BE via a swagger and code generation.
The stack is:
TypeScript, React, Vite, tailwind and shadcn for UI.

All code is under `src` and the generated backend code is under `src/generated` - the latter should never be touched directly unless there's a library patch required.
